name: Grauby Grauby
description:
Help Grauby the slime to escape his dungeon before the guild of the warriors arrives to look for enemy loots and chests of gold.

Each jump Grauby gives he sacrifices a bit of his body mass, if he doesnt get more slime loots in time he desapears forever.

Use the mouse to drag Grauby’s body to reach his objective.
